about_the_game:
Get yourself into the action with this fun Swamp Level on Incredifall Demo!
Oversized Pickles and Giant Crocodiles / Gators infest the level. Your mission is to get to the end unscathed!
Get the best score in the fastest time to win a full version copy of Incredifall on Steam!
The demo is great for testing out gameplay.
Computer game performance can also be tested with the Incredifall Demo.

Enjoy!

Enjoy!
name: Incredifall Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 900 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX or ATI Equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 900 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX or ATI Equivalent

short_description: Incredifall Demo Level Gartors and Gherkins! Outrageous Fun!! Play now! Test your comp's performance at the same time! Get the highest score in the fastest time to win a full copy of Incredifall!
